name: Astoria Colombo
title: A Brand-new Luxury Apartment
description: Astoria Colombo offers a range of luxury condominiums in Sri Lanka that are too beautiful to be true. Located in the heart of Colombo, Astoria stands tall on Deal Place, Colombo 3, surrounded by the best Colombo has to offer. With shopping malls, cinemas, restaurants and hotels just a stone’s throw away, Astoria lets the occupiers be part of modern living in Colombo that is changing lifestyles in Sri Lanka. Astoria also offers great investment opportunities in Sri Lanka for anyone interested in tapping into Colombo real estate.
Approach: Did comprehensive market research to analyze the target audience and how to target them.
Luxury real-estate buyers also like exclusivity, so while we’re marketing Astoria projects, suggest using pronouns that personalize the social campaigns and directly spoke to their psyche.
A luxury buyer is very aware of the market scenario and intelligent enough to take a very calculated decision. Understanding this helped my campaigns generate quality leads.
Based on the analysis ran different types of campaigns which further brought down the costs by using call action catch analysis and generating leads.

Approached the audience with all types of creative ads like Carousel Ads, Lead Ads, 360*Ads, Google Display Ads & Search Ads. Which was effective to drive more traffic and also increased more new followers.
StrategiesUsed: A complete digital marketing strategy was compiled for the client.
Created an efficient content marketing strategy.
Created a community for the audience.
Jazzed up the profile with diverse e content strategy.
Created profiles on the relevant channels.
Established a social media budget.
Ran cross-channel campaigns.
Keyword Research and Planning
Monthly SEO on Page Audit

Results.title: Likes increased by within two months

Note: Strategy & Design Concept Guidelines provided by myself. Actual Design is done by designer

name: RE/MAX COMMUNITY REALTY INC. BROKERAGE
title: RE/MAX COMMUNITY REALTY INC. BROKERAGE
description: RE/MAX Community Realty Inc. Brokerage founded with the vision of pursuing the New Era of Real Estate. They aim to provide clients and agents with more exposure, brand value, innovation and quality service. Team of RE/MAX Community Realty is committed to providing the highest level of representation and top-notch customer service for our clients with an in-depth understanding of the ever-evolving marketplace which sets us apart from the rest.

goals.goal: Get Cv’s or Generate Leads from specific target audience (Job Seekers who intrested to work in real estate field)

Approach: Run Google & Facebook /LinkedIn  Ad campaigns to get qualified leads
Suggested Tiktok / Instagram Reels for Branding Purpose
RE/MAX Branding Posts / Benefits Posts / Tips & Latest Trends Posts / Videos / Current Agent Posts, Reviews
StrategiesUsed: Analyzing keyword research and hashtag trends to inform the development of an editorial calendar for engaging, shareable content
Developing and implementing monthly social media calendars
Form an intensive social media and digital marketing plan and subsequent campaigns
Email marketing to keep the audience abreast with the happenings at RE/MAX. Emails will be a means to keep the leads interested in the brand.
Developing a FaceFacebook-promotedt strategy to increase overall reach and engagement with Facebook content and improve the standing with the Facebook algorithm
Agent retention and recruitment, offering the ability to reach the agent base with calculated targeting and frequency, improving faith in the tactics and also improving lead conversion
Targeted existing Real Estate agents at competing brokers for recruitment.
Note: Strategy & Design Concept Guidelines provided by myself. Actual Design is done by designer

name: Limitless Energy Drinks
title: Limitless Energy Drinks
description: Limitless Energy is the natural alternative to traditional energy drinks. Derived from green tea extract, never synthesised, Limitless Energy drinks contain only natural caffeine. When you need mental focus and physical energy, ensure you drink only the highest quality natural caffeine - our caffeine hit lasts longer than most, with no peaks, no troughs, no jitters and no crash. 100% Natural | 100% Vegan | Zero Caffeine | Low Calorie

Snapchat & TikTok Campaigns
Implemented Google ads by connecting google merchant center
Display Ads

Boosted Review from specific Target Audience

Google Merchant Ads through Google Adwords

Delivering high quality travel services to all prime global travel destinations.

Call Ads and Search Ads for Flights + Hotel
Added FAQ Schema Markup for Relevant Page

name: Namaste India
title: Namaste India
description: Namaste India is a fully licensed Indian restaurant operating in UK specialized in serving authentic Indian Cuisine such as: North Indian, South Indian and Vegetarian food. For more than 35 years Namaste India brings the sublime and complex flavours of the Indian epicurean heritage and they use the freshest ingredients to make sure their customers’ experience with them is delightful.
Approach: Increase brand awareness
Getting Order through Namaste India App
Provide attractive offers & promotions to the audience
Host contests & giveaways
Suggested to do more videos to reach the audience
Implement content strategy for each social media channel
Instagram stories, reels and Tiktok
Listed in Third Party Food Ordering & Delivery Apps
StrategiesUsed: Clean, attractive and appealing designs were used and uploaded on social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram.
Integrate Facebook & Instagram Shop Tab
Select and separate our target audience from a wide pool of people. So created a marketing funnel that narrowed them down even further to a strong set.
Targeting audiences interested in food and trying out different food within the area. Radius targeting was done to achieve this feet and our ads targeted specific genres of people.
Offers and offer ads were used for retargeting customers who have already engaged with the brand.
Reposting customer photos for future brand growth.
Shared customer reviews in all the social media channels
Started Promotions & Offers : Student Promotions / App Order Promo

Results.title: Increase in social media brand awareness

Note: Strategy & Design Concept Guidelines provided by myself. Actual Design is done by designer
